metadata.title: CVE-2023-49086 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti is a robust performance and fault management framework and a frontendto RRDTool - a Time Series Database (TSDB). Bypassing an earlier fix(CVE-2023-39360) that leads to a DOM XSS attack. Exploitation of thevulnerability is possible for an authorized user. The vulnerable componentis the `graphs_new.php`. Impact of the vulnerability - execution ofarbitrary javascript code in the attacked user's browser. This issue hasbeen patched in version 1.2.26.

criterions.comment: cacti package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
